price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang kafir, bagi mereka tidak akan berguna sedikit pun harta benda dan anak-anak mereka terhadap (azab) Allah. Dan mereka itu (menjadi) bahan bakar api neraka.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ وَقُودُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan wa-ulāika hum waqūdu al-nāri
